name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Frontend Developer with expertise in **Angular**, **TypeScript**, **HTML5**, **CSS/SCSS**, and RESTful APIs. Proficient in utilizing tools like **Postman** for API testing and optimizing performance using **Jasmine**, **Jest**, and **Cypress** for robust testing solutions. Demonstrated ability to implement modern build pipelines and manage CI/CD processes effectively. A collaborative team player with a proven ability to solve complex problems in fast-paced environments. With a strong foundation in Java and Spring Boot, I have a track record of designing scalable, reliable applications across diverse sectors such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed responsive user interfaces utilizing **Angular**, **TypeScript**, **HTML5**, and **CSS/SCSS**, successfully enhancing user engagement and accessibility.
Created and optimized **RESTful APIs** for seamless integration with backend services, improving response times by up to **40%**.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Git** and modern build tools, achieving **80%** reduction in deployment times and enhancing workflow efficiency.
Utilized **Postman** for API testing and validation, ensuring robust error handling and high performance in production environments.
Conducted performance optimization strategies, contributing to a **30%** increase in page load speed and overall user satisfaction.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, demonstrating exceptional problem-solving skills and fostering effective teamwork throughout the development process.
Executed unit testing with frameworks such as **Jasmine** and **Jest** to ensure code quality and reliability, achieving **99%** test coverage.
Integrated **Contentful** as a headless CMS for dynamic content management, improving content delivery and overall website performance.

Collaborated with the development team to optimize performance and implement modern build pipelines, resulting in a **40% improvement in load times**.

Demonstrated strong problem-solving and teamwork skills, leading to the successful delivery of features within tight deadlines.
